### 1. Source data
```{r source, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}

   library(knitr)
   library(tidyverse)
   library(here)

   astronaut_raw <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-07-14/astronauts.csv')
   astronaut_photos <- read_csv(here("2020-07-14", "source", "astronaut photos.csv"))
   
   space_img <- "https://cdn.wallpapersafari.com/83/9/z8eIEZ.jpg"
   dev.set(dev.next())
   
   opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
```


### 2.  Explore data
```{r explore}

   library(skimr)
   library(here)

   skim (astronaut_raw)
```


### 3.  Transform data
```{r transform}

   library (glue)
   library (countrycode)
   
   #https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_spaceflight-related_accidents_and_incidents
   astronaut_fatality <- astronaut_raw %>%
      filter (mission_title %in% c("Soyuz 1","Soyuz 11","STS-107", "STS-51L","STS-51-L", "STS 51-L")) %>%
      pull (name)

   astronaut <- astronaut_raw %>%
      group_by (name) %>%
      arrange (-mission_number) %>%
      filter (name %in% astronaut_fatality)%>%
      slice(1) %>%
      mutate (
         name = glue ("{word(name,2)} {word (name, 1)}"),
         name = str_remove(name,","),
         name_life = glue ("{name}\n({year_of_birth} - {year_of_mission})"),
         nationality_name = ifelse (nationality == "U.S.S.R/Russia", "Russia",nationality),
         nationality_code = countrycode(nationality_name, origin = "country.name", destination = "iso2c"),
         number_global_nation = glue ("{number}/{nationwide_number}"),
         mission_hours = round(total_hrs_sum,0),
         mission_hours_count= glue ("{mission_hours}/{total_number_of_missions}"),
         mission_title = recode (mission_title, "STS-51-L" = "STS-51L", "STS 51-L" = "STS-51L")
         ) %>%
      left_join (astronaut_photos) %>%
      ungroup (name) %>%
      select (name_life, nationality_code, number_global_nation, mission_title, year_of_mission, mission_hours_count, photo) %>%
      arrange (mission_title)
      #head(2)
```


### 4.  Visualize - indvidual charts
```{r visualize_med}

   library (ggimage)

   #https://github.com/GuangchuangYu/ggimage/issues/6

   g<- ggplot (astronaut) +
      geom_text(
         aes (x = 0, y = 0, label = number_global_nation),
         size = 3, hjust = 0, vjust = 0, color = "white"
         ) +
      geom_text(
         aes (x = 1, y = 0, label = mission_hours_count),
         size = 3, hjust = 1, vjust = 0, color = "white"
         ) +
      geom_flag(
         aes (x = 0.5, y = 0, image = nationality_code),
         size = 0.2, hjust = 0.5, vjust = 0
         ) +
      geom_rect(
         aes (xmin = 0, xmax = 1, ymin = 0.8, ymax = 1, fill = mission_title, color = mission_title),
         size = 3
         ) +
      geom_text(
         aes (x = 0.5, y = 0.9, label = name_life),
         size = 3, hjust = 0.5, vjust = 0.5, color = "white"
         ) +
      scale_color_viridis_d() +
      scale_fill_viridis_d() +
      #geom_image(aes(x=0.5, y=0.5, image = photo),size = 0.25) +
      theme_void() +
      theme (
         panel.border = element_rect (color = "white", fill = NA),
         plot.background = element_rect(fill = "black"),
         strip.background = element_blank(),
         strip.text = element_blank()
      ) +
      facet_wrap (vars(year_of_mission, mission_title, name_life))
   
      ggbackground (g, space_img, alpha = 0.2)
   
      ggsave(here("2020-07-14", "output", "astronaut.png"))
   

```
